mapper.select: SELECT USER_SEQ as userSeq, USER_ID as userId, USER_EMAIL as userEmail, USER_NAME as userName, USER_NICKNAME as userNickname, USER_PHONE as userPhone, USER_BOD as userBod, USER_PROFILE_IMAGE_URL as userProfileImageUrl,USER_REGISTER_DATE as userRegisterDate, USER_CLS as userCls FROM USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
